column2: Doesn't matter if you're a Halfling, an Ogre or something else, the promise of good grub is worth fighting for.
Halflings have a knack for dodging blows before pin-pointing exposed armour and thrusting thier blade.
Devoted to thier gods these Arabyans give out a shrill howl in thier honour.
Fimir surround themselves with a magically-created mist, through which the Fimir are barely discernable from a distance of more than few metres.
